h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Visionary Centipede Staff Location
content: The Visionary Centipede Staff can be found after completing Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. Once you start Chapter 5, you can rest at a Shrine to craft it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Visionary_Centipede_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Visionary Centipede Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Visionary Centipede Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Visionary Centipede Staff can be found after completing Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. Once you start Chapter 5, you can rest at a Shrine to craft it.
